sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Button, Text, Grommet, Main, Heading, Card, CardHeader,CardFooter,CardBody} from 'grommet';
import { AppsRounded, DocumentUpdate, Group, ShieldSecurity, Support, PhoneVertical, Server, UserAdd, Magic } from 'grommet-icons';
import Foooter from './component/Foooter';
import Headerr from './component/Headerr';



function App() {

  const theme = {
    global: {
      colors: {
        brand: '#01A982',
      },
      font: {
        family: 'Roboto',
        size: '18px',
        height: '20px',
      },
    },
  };


  return (
    <Grommet theme={theme}>
      <Headerr />

      <Main pad="small" margin={{ left: 'large', right: 'large'}} >
        <Box>
          <Heading margin={{ left: "small",top: "large", bottom: "none"}}>Hello, Jane!</Heading>
          <Text margin="small">Welcome to the HPE Common Cloud Console.</Text>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large" pad="medium">
          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="#00567A">
                <CardHeader>
                  <Button icon={<Magic />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad={{horizontal: "small"}}>
                <Text weight="bold">Take a Tour</Text>
                <Text size="xsmall">See everything the HPE Console has to offer in this short tour.</Text>
                </CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="small"> 
                  <Button primary label="Start Tour" size="small" color="#00567A"/>
                </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="#00567A">
                <CardHeader>
                  <Button icon={<Server />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad={{horizontal: "small"}}>
                <Text weight="bold">HPE Compute Console</Text>
                <Text size="xsmall">See everything the HPE Console has to offer in this short tour.</Text>
                </CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad={{horizontal: "small"}}>
                  <Button primary label="Launch" size="small" color="#00567A"/>
                </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<AppsRounded />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">App Catalog</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<Support />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Guides & Resources</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large">
        <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<UserAdd />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Assign User Access</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<Group />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Invite Users</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<ShieldSecurity />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Add a SSO/SAML Connection</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<PhoneVertical />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Setup Multi-Factor Authentication</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large" pad="medium">
          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">
                  <Button icon={<DocumentUpdate />} onClick={() => {}} />
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Get Release Notes</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
          
        </Box>
        
      </Main>

      <Foooter />
    </Grommet>
  );
}

export default App;
